info.name: Swipe Rite (Wuxiaworld.com)
info.description:
Turn the chapter into a slider/pages.
For those who are used to reading a page style ebook or pdf.
If you are using a mouse, use shift+scroll to change page.
info.additionalInfo: A port of my other style with similar purpose for wuxiaworld. Works on Chrome version 69 and Firefox version 39. 30/8/2018 Publication Fix for not scrolling into last page on early version of firefox. 1/9/2018 Change how Translator's Thought looks and behave 19/2/2019 Fix for some series that has different formatting, such as SFF. 19/2/2019 Fix for new layout. 11/6/2020 Fix for the website update. Fix for styles for wider screen. Changes for a few tag/class/IDs. New style for several buttons. If you wanna publish your own modified code, it's cool, just give me a shout out.
